context: Is it better than a scuf grip because i have a scuf controller with no grip ? Thanks for any help.
response: well i never used a scuf grip but by the way it looks i would say squidgrip works a little better

context: can any character work on  the starter pack?
Can you use this with other games on xbox 360?  Or just Modern Warfare 3?
Does this keyboard have a matte finish? Or is it just plastic?
response: Has a nice matte finish, some parts of the keyboard are glossy for looks but it doesn't look like cheap glossy plastic. Keys feel nice. Outside of the keys doesnt feel as nice as the keys but it doesnt feel cheap, its nice and sturdy. Looks good.

context: What machine does this play on?
response: My kids play it in XBox 360.
I use them every day with my laptop at home and my terminal at work.  If you have a standard headphone or speaker port on your computer, they will work with it.

context: Will this joystick work with XP?
response: It should, it may not work with particular game though.  You may lose some of the functions of your flight stick.

context: I own Rof Iron Cross edition. Which flight joysticks are supported or recommended as my Logitech Freedom 2.4 is fried and I need to replace. thanks
response: I use Logitch Extreme 3D Pro and it works for me. Can't get the throttle to work on the joystick, but the key board works for that. Hope that helps.

context: Does this come as a single CD key for both, or one for each?
can this work as a bluetooth controller for a mac?
response: Yes you can connect this controller to your Mac, the software for PS3 controllers is built in to OS X mountain lion and above. Just turn the controller on, go into settings and open Bluetooth and it should come up there and connect a there ya are.

context: if i plug without batteries can i play?
response: you don't need battries you can just use the cable

context: If it says sony on it it is genuine.
response: There may be imposters on the market. I would look for quality markings of the logo and features (dualshock 3, sixaxis, PS  button) and the manufacturers sticker on the back, it's almost part of the controller and won't come off. Also check for weight, it has the mechanism inside for realism effects.

context: Is this game compatiable with Windows 8.1 64 bit edition ?
Is this an online only game? Can I play it offline ?
response: It has a campaign but you can't pay split screen with friends or play against bots either.
